item.name: Arrowfield Estate
item.address1: Cnr Hermitage Road/Mistletoe Lane, Pokolbin, NSW 2320
item.description: Changes have come thick and fast for Arrowfield. Its Upper Hunter winery and vineyards were acquired by a coal mining company, and it has moved to the Lower Hunter, with 36ha of contract fruit. In October 2010 the InWine Group, which owned Arrowfield and Red Hill Estate, was acquired by Cheviot Bridge. Exports to the US Canada, Ireland, Thailand, Japan, Hong Kong and Singapore.
